attributes.action: All Police Constables should have the opportunity to become taser trained.
attributes.additional_details: I think that with current circumstances from terror attacks to Brexit that Police Constables that server for our country and protect ourselves and our loved ones should have the chance to become taser trained to make those protecting us feel more safe doing the great job they do!
attributes.background: In my opinion all Serving Police Constables should have the chance to be taser trained, so this being optional.

rejection.details:
This is an operational decision for individual police forces, not the UK Parliament and Government.

You might like to make this suggestion to your local Police and Crime Commissioner, who is elected. You can find out more about Police and Crime Commissioners, including how to contact them, here: 

https://www.gov.uk/police-and-crime-commissioners
